title: Results of MBBS exams at Pondicherry University out after Lt. Governor intervenes | Education News
desc: The results of MBBS exams for Pondicherry University were declared on Monday after the Lieutenant Governor intervened. Till now, the results were delayed due to various reasons and the University explained why.

title: Bharat Biotech submits documents for Covaxin’s ‘emergency use listing’ to WHO, approval expected ‘at earliest’ | India News
desc: Bharat Biotech head Krishna Ella on Monday said that all documents required for the Emergency Use Listing of Covaxin were submitted to the WHO on July 9.

title: UP: Married woman, her paramour found hanging with sari in Aligarh | India News
desc: Atrauli police in Aligarh said the couple fell in love despite both being married. The deceased woman Vimlesh was the sister-in-law of Ravi's elder brother.

title: Inzamam slams England | Pakistan's Inzamam-ul-Haq slams Babar Azam & Co. for playing ODI cricket with T20 mindset in England | Cricket News
desc: Pakistan legend Inzamam-ul-Haq has slammed Babar Azam & Co. for playing ODI cricket with a T20 mindset in England. Ben Stokes' England have sealed the 3-match bilateral series by winning the first 2 matches.

title: Investment Plan | Planning to book profit after recent market rally? Ask yourself these 5 questions | Business News
desc: Before pressing the exit button, investors need to look beyond emotional reasons. Without a proper framework, sell decisions may cost the investor dearly.

title: India tour of England | Virat Kohli & Co. fully vaccinated in England; set to undergo multiple tests before Test series: Report | Cricket News
desc: Indian cricketers in the UK have reportedly been fully vaccinated after BCCI arranged the second dose of Covid-19 vaccine for them with the help of the NHS.

title: Himachal Pradesh floods | Himachal Pradesh floods: 3 NDRF teams carry out rescue work in Boh village, PM says situation being monitored | India News
desc: Himachal Pradesh flood: Incessant rains wreaked havoc in Himachal Pradesh. Major roads have been blocked due to landslides and tourists have been asked to stay wherever they are.

title: Will Yuzi Chahal, Kuldeep Yadav play together in T20 World Cup? Former Indian keeper gives his take on 'Kulcha' ahead of Sri Lanka tour  | Cricket News
desc: Former Indian keeper-batsman-turned-commentator Deep Dasgupta has opined on the chances of Yuzvendra Chahal and Kuldeep Yadav playing together in the T20 World Cup, ahead of the Sri Lanka tour.

title: COVID-19 rearing its head again? Rise in R-value in July first week hints at fresh spike | India News
desc: The R-value, also known as effective transmission rate or the reproduction number, has gone up to 0.88 in the first week of July from 0.78 on 30 June, revealed an analysis by the researchers.

title: MPPSC Prelims 2021 Admit card released for July 25 exam- check how to download here  | Education News
desc: MPPSC Prelims 2021 admit card has been released for State Service and Forest Services exam to be held on July 25. Candidates appearing for the same can click on the direct link for downloading given here.

title: Styris TROLLS England \ England had more corners: Scott Styris takes sly dig at ICC's boundary count rule after UEFA Euro final | Cricket News
desc: Taking a sly dig at ICC's boundary count rule after UEFA Euro final, former New Zealand all-rounder Scott Styris mocked England's defeat to Italy on penalties in the summit clash of the European championships.

title: Johnson & Johnson’s Covid-19 vaccine could cause paralysis, warns FDA
desc: The Johnson & Johnson vaccine had run into trouble earlier this year after the FDA briefly paused the jab following a rare blood clotting complication.
